title: France panorama. [No. 74/50]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: In the news: The six day bicycle race - a tradition in Grenoble. The Goncourt Literary Prize - Pascal Laine, this year’s prize-winner. 2. Liberty, Liberty - at the Alliance Francaise Theater. 3. Gyroplanes - French helicopters. The arts - Irene de Ramel.
